main.name: Moctar Diallo
main.description: I build Deep Artificial Neural Networks well adapted to processing Big Data Images and Videos and make sense of it, or Computer Vision. Applications are Crop and Soil Monitoring in Agriculture, Self-Driving Cars in the Automobile industry, Medical Image Diagnosis in Healhcare, Document Authentication and OCR(Object Character Recognition) in Administration and Banking, etc
main.bio: I am a Pythonist, Deep Learning Engineer and Computer Vision Specialist. My gang of four: Python, Kivy, Tensorflow, OpenCV
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Here i learned general engineering principles, the software engineering discipline, and programming languages like Java, Python and Lisp. Plus a thorough understanding of Algorithms design and implementations along with different comparisons of different paradigms of computations. A more pleased course i also followed is the Artificial Intelligence(6.034) course by Professor Patrick Winston

I learned C here and forgot it. I also learned C++ and forgot it. Then i learned CSS and also.. forgot it. I remeber using some terminal commands in linux, and... i forgot the rest. Oh yes, some SQL too! But i forgot it, and had to relearn it on youtube(or somewhere else.. i forgot where). But campus was cool!!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
